
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex and called "ya"
# (https://github.com/yandex/yatool).
#
# Configuration files of ya build system usually named as ya.make. If ya.make file is presented
# at the  root of the repository, then this repository supports ya build. 
# 
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configuration, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build 
# system may be rejected.

add_executable(unittester-core-rpc)


target_compile_options(unittester-core-rpc PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)

target_link_libraries(unittester-core-rpc PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  yt-yt-core
  core-rpc-grpc
  rpc-unittests-lib
  yt-core-test_framework
  cpp-testing-common
)

target_link_options(unittester-core-rpc PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(unittester-core-rpc PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/rpc/unittests/handle_channel_failure_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/rpc/unittests/roaming_channel_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/rpc/unittests/rpc_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/rpc/unittests/viable_peer_registry_ut.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  unittester-core-rpc
  COMMAND
  unittester-core-rpc
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-core-rpc
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-core-rpc
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-core-rpc
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)


target_allocator(unittester-core-rpc
  cpp-ytalloc-impl
)

vcs_info(unittester-core-rpc)
